results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእኛ ላይም ከፊልን ቃላት (ያላልነውን) በቀጠፈ ኖሮ፤
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም ከእርሱ የልቡን ሥር (የተንጠለጠለበትን ጅማት) በቆረጥን ነበር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእናንተም ውስጥ ከእርሱ ላይ ከልካዮች ምንም አይኖሩም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እኛም ከእናንተ ውስጥ አስተባባዮች መኖራቸውን በእርግጥ እናውቃለን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
